name: No.1002 FREEWAY lace-up knee boot Black
description:
the ultimate wallflower power boot.  all-evil, tall evil or small evil, you won't be alone for long in these boots. the pyramids up the back may be hidden, but you won't be!  emma peel karate skills included…no extra charge!


introducing the FREEWAY construction: inspired by the desire for modernity in the 50s and 60's… but mashed up with the work and western boot ethic of practicality. this construction features all the same details that make our shoes distinctive: soft leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining and footbed that forms to your foot in time, making incredibly comfortable boots. hand-lasted and sewn with a leather welt and leather midsole by genuine goodyear-welt construction, then nailed in the shank area for iron-like strength. leather outsoles and toplifts of recycled tires using the LightTread (TM) process add lightweight flexibility, comfort and durability! the entire shoe is then hand-finished to ensure each shoe has its own unique character.

introducing the FREEWAY construction: inspired by the 90's... the 1890's! this construction features all the same details that make our shoes a rare gem: soft leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining that forms to your foot in time making incredibly comfortable boots. hand-lasted and sewn with a leather welt and leather midsole by genuine goodyear-welt construction, then nailed in the shank area for iron-like strength. recycled tires using the LightTread (TM) process add lightweight flexibility, comfort and durability! the entire shoe is then hand-finished to ensure each shoe has it's own unique character.

name: No.1005 FREEWAY ankle zip boot w. harness Emerald
description:
sexy, green and industrial,  the business end of this mashup hugs your foot and ankle, all the while stealin' attention from every direction. and why not…it has three ways to steal soles:  the unique recycled-tire removable harness rocks tough, industrial and kinky on your ankles or take that badgirl off for a clean, sophisticated look, or lastly, slap that mutha' on most any of your other psk boots with a heel! Neck-breaker… with a heart of gold.


introducing the FREEWAY construction: inspired by the desire for modernity in the 50s and 60's… but mashed up with the work and western boot ethic of practicality. this construction features all the same details that make our shoes distinctive: soft leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining and footbed that forms to your foot in time, making incredibly comfortable boots. hand-lasted and sewn with a leather welt and leather midsole by genuine goodyear-welt construction, then nailed in the shank area for iron-like strength. leather outsoles and toplifts of recycled tires using the LightTread (TM) process add lightweight flexibility, comfort and durability! the entire shoe is then hand-finished to ensure each shoe has its own unique character.

name: No.1023 SIDEWALK side buckle ankle boot Black
description:
air conditioned ankles and enough metal to make ozzy coherent is what we're goin' on about. get to the point quick and dirty in these sex machines masquerading as shoes. not for the faint of heart…


welcome the SIDEWALK construction: inspired by the same desire for modernity in the 50s and 60's as the FREEWAY construction… but with a slightly more architectural heel. this construction features all the same details that make our shoes distinctive: soft leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining and footbed that forms to your foot in time, making incredibly comfortable boots. hand-lasted and sewn with a leather welt and leather midsole by genuine goodyear-welt construction, then nailed in the shank area for iron-like strength. leather outsoles and toplifts of recycled tires using the LightTread (TM) process add lightweight flexibility, comfort and durability! the entire shoe is then hand-finished to ensure each shoe has its own unique character.

name: No.1025 SIDEWALK laceless oxford Black
description:
refusing to be bound by neither man nor convention, this stretchy seductress may have forgotten her laces but she's packing' enough heat to burn anyone brave enough to venture near! lace - less is more…



welcome the SIDEWALK construction: inspired by the same desire for modernity in the 50s and 60's as the FREEWAY construction… but with a slightly more architectural heel. this construction features all the same details that make our shoes distinctive: soft leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining and footbed that forms to your foot in time, making incredibly comfortable boots. hand-lasted and sewn with a leather welt and leather midsole by genuine goodyear-welt construction, then nailed in the shank area for iron-like strength. leather outsoles and toplifts of recycled tires using the LightTread (TM) process add lightweight flexibility, comfort and durability! the entire shoe is then hand-finished to ensure each shoe has its own unique character.

name: No.1044 TARMAC tie shoe Black
description:
bound for glory in simplicity,  our new, one-boy band, joins his sophisticated, older brothers in cool factor…all with a simple tug of a lace. unassuming…but deadly! 


meet the TARMAC family for boys and girls: dysfunctional in only the best way!  we sprinkle a full can o' whoop-ass onto every TARMAC style, so you don't have to.  Sleek and almost pointed, this construction raises ghosts of rock n' rollers past and present, and holds out the promise of future badassness!   sharing all the same quality details that make our shoes unique: soft leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining, hand-lasted and sewn with a leather welt and leather midsole by genuine goodyear-welt construction. recycled tires and jet tire inner tubes use the LightTread (TM) process to add flexibility, comfort and durability! the entire shoe is then hand-finished to ensure each shoe has it's own unique character.

name: No.0048 CROSSWALK tall cap toe boot Tan
description:
No. 0048's are definitely the biggest kid on the block, but far from being a bully, she's the coolest big sister any of our boots could want. with multiple personalities at her disposal, she's sultry AND sweet, just waiting for the right woman and outfit to bring out whatever personality is dying to come out. HOT! handle with care...


 introducing the CROSSWALK construction: inspired by the 90's... the 1890's! this construction features all the same details that make our unisex shoes one-of-a-kind: incredibly soft leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining, hand-lasted and sewn with a leather welt and leather midsole by genuine goodyear-welt construction, then nailed in the shank area for iron-like strength. recycled tires using the LightTread (TM) process add lightweight flexibility, comfort and durability! the entire shoe is then hand-finished to ensure each shoe has it's own unique character.

name: No.0037 TOLTECA ankle harness boot Moss
description:
TOLTECA ANKLE HARNESS BOOT Model No.0037 a new addition to the psk family, bringing freshness to the already badass gang.

this harness boot is built using full-grain leather for the upper, goodyear-welted construction with a double leather storm welt and recycled LightTread(TM) tire outsole... fully leather lined with leather covered memory foam footbed to form to your foot. though delicate looking, industrial vibes still flow with heavy duty antique brass hardware - its time to put your foot down.. into this boot, dammit!...

name: No.0025 UNDERPASS moccasin desert boot Oiled Tan
description:
UNDERPASS MOCCASIN DESERT BOOT Model No.0025

introducing the UNDERPASS construction: completely handmade and constructed with love. inspired by the Mohawk Indians who came to NY to work on skyscrapers, our version is a mash-up of an industrial bootie and their indigenous footwear. this construction features all the same details that make our unisex shoes one-of-a-kind: high quality leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining, hand-lasted and hand-sewn using a genuine true moccasin construction with a genuine leather & recycled tire outsole using the LightTread (TM) process for the heel. the entire shoe is then hand-finished to ensure each shoe has it's own unique character.

introducing the UNDERPASS construction: completely handmade and constructed with love. inspired by the Mohawk Indians who came to NY to work on skyscrapers, our version is a mash-up of an industrial bootie and their indigenous footwear. this construction features all the same details that make our unisex shoes one-of-a-kind: high quality leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining, hand-lasted and hand-sewn using a genuine true moccasin construction with a genuine leather & recycled tire outsole using the LightTread (TM) process for the heel. the entire shoe is then hand-finished to ensure each shoe has it's own unique character.

name: No.60001 hidden pyramid sandal. black leather
description:
HIDDEN PYRAMID STUD SANDAL Model No.60001 takes your sandal game to a whole new level, there has never been a better time flaunt your feet and kick ass in sandals...

introducing the pskaufman... sandal construction: reflecting upon the artisanal way shoes are made, we have decided to take the road less traveled... this construction features all the same details that make our other shoes one-of-a-kind: incredibly soft leather uppers and signature turquoise leather lining, hand-lasted and sewn. the uppers of the sandals fetaure hidden pyramid studs, giving you all the baddass-ery you'll ever need and more. what make our sandals truly different is the way we bind our out soles: the out sole is made from recycled tire inner tube and is wrapped around the base of the upper and hand stitched to create a high quality, durable product sure to last as long as your feet do. let your feet live a little, sandal weather is all year 'round...

description:

description:
No.60028 Key Fob.
new to the accessory clan. keep it simple with natural or black leather or bust out a neck brakin', head turnin', eye poppin' suede color.  one side recycled tire, one side (awesome) psk.. logo. 
so what are you waiting for? quit the diggin' for keys and get clipped (by a key fob)

introducing the pskaufman... accessories line: staying true to our twisted classics inspiration, this construction is heavy duty and  built to last. name: No.90012 change my mind bag. black saddle leather + recycled jet tire inner tube
description:
CHANGE MY MIND BAG Model No.90012  the easy access, store almost everything, totally convertible, why-would-you-ever-need-another-bag bag... please note: bag pictured has been custom painted. bags are delivered unpainted unless arranged otherwise. please contact us for details.

introducing the pskaufman... accessories line: staying true to our twisted classics inspiration, this bag is heavy duty and built to last. Model No. 90012 features some of the same details that make our shoes one-of-a-kind and incredibly badass: the highest quality leather exteriors, signature turquoise leather lining, all crafted and hand-finished by true artisans. staying true to our love of all things durable, all accessories feature antiqued hardware.

using a leather exterior and recycled jet tire inner tube gusset, this bag is a durable, carry-all. Model No. 90012 is equipped with interior necessities: a stretch inner tube/leather pocket for your smartphone, seamless zip pocket and padded tablet pocket perfect for an ipad.. and just in case, your 15" laptop will fit inside the main compartment.

this quick change artist switches in moments from a shoulder/cross body bag to backpack, transforming, before you even know what hit you. fully adjustable, and removable, shoulder pads and straps make this bag an ideal backpack for every situation. its about time the backpack got a badass face-lift. and since we live by badass, model no.90012 converts into a motorcycle bag for those gals and guys out there who truly know what it means to ride in style... 

<all pskaufman... accessories are encased in a hand-woven dust bag, free with purchase.  we have created a partnership with an artisanal weaver who hand-spins and dyes his wool, he creates beautiful designs on manually operated looms, which he has built.  we truly value and admire his craftsmanship and want to pass this beautiful product along to you...>
